\begin{figure}
\noindent \begin{centering}
\scalebox{1}{
    \begin{pspicture}(-1,-0.5)(8,3) 

	% THE COORDINATE SYSTEM 	         
	
	\psline[arrowsize=6pt 0]{->}(0,0)(7,0.0) 
	\rput[l](7.25,0){$\varrho$} 	         
	\psline[arrowsize=6pt 0]{->}(0,0)(0,2.75) 
	\rput[tr](-0.3,2.75){$q$} 	         
	
	% ANNOTATED, TRIANGULAR FUNDAMENTAL DIAGRAM
	
	\pspolygon*[linecolor=lightgray](0,0)(2,2)(6,0)
    \rput(2.5,0.5){\psframebox*{$\min\{S(\varrho),R(\varrho)\}$}}

	\psline[](0,0)(2,2)(6,2) 	         	
	\rput[b](1,2.1){$R(\varrho)$}
	\psline[linestyle=dotted](0.67,0.67)(0.67,1.33)(1.33,1.33)  	     	\rput[r](0.41,1.0){\psframebox*[fillcolor=white]{$v$}} 	   

	\psline[linestyle=dashed](0,2)(2,2)(6,0)
	\rput[b](5,2.1){$S(\varrho)$}
	\psline[linestyle=dotted](3.33,1.33)(4.67,1.33)(4.67,0.67)  	         
	\rput[l](4.91,1.0){$w$} 	         
	    
	\rput[r](-0.25,2){$\hat{q}$}
	\rput[t](6,-0.25){$\hat{\varrho}$}

	\end{pspicture}   
}
\par\end{centering}

\end{figure}
